text: Kkes ed wid iusan ar ugdud ukud tesaam laaqed, ne$ i kwen id iusan, gguman wulawen nnsen a kwen nna$en, ne$ ad nna$en agdud nnsen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, yili Ifka yasen adabu fellawen, a kwen nna$en. Ma aazlen iman nnsen segwen, ur kwen nnu$en, ssutren awen d tifrat, ur kwen Ippawi Oebbi $uosen
